text:
Britney Spears has only ten shows left until she is finished with her long-running “Piece of Me” residency in Las Vegas, and RadarOnline.com has exclusively learned that “she can’t wait” to be done with Sin City!

And according to a source close to Spears, she already has her post-Vegas agenda set!

“Britney’s friends and family know what she is planning to do after she is done with Vegas,” a source close to the 35-year-old mother of two said, noting that "it’s not work!”
title: Tuning Out: Britney Spears ‘Can’t Wait’ To Finish Las Vegas Residency

meta_data.description: Britney Spears has only ten shows left until she is done with her three year Las Vegas 'Piece of Me' residency, and Radar has learned that she 'can't wait' to finish!
